entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:39 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 08:39 AM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
